content:
To add a spicy kick to this dish, you can try the following:

* Add a diced jalapeno pepper or red pepper flakes to the pan with the garlic in step 4.
* Season the chicken with chili powder or cumin for added heat.
* Serve the dish with hot sauce, such as sriracha or Frank's RedHot, on the side.
* Mix in some diced green chilies or chopped chipotle peppers in adobo sauce into the rice mixture in step 6.

These are just a few suggestions to make the dish spicier. You can adjust the level of heat to your liking by adding more or less of the spicy ingredients.
